column4: description
Primary (e.g. WMO) ID for station
Scheme used for primary ID
Record number for this station entry
Secondary (e.g. local) ID for station
Scheme used for secondary ID
Name of station (e.g. Tateno)
Abbreviation of station name (e.g. TAT)
Alternative name for station
coordinate reference system used to report stations location
Report position for station if stationary or NULL if mobile. If more than one estimate record best here and additional values using optional fields.
Report position for station if stationary or NULL if mobile
Local gravity at station location (units ms-2)
Date that the station first started reporting in this configuration
Last data the station reported in this configuration
Type of reporting station
Generic type of observing platform
Specific type of observing platform
Institute operating the station (e.g. National Oceanography Centre)
Sub-region where station is located or country of registry for mobile station
Nearest city / town to station location
Contact for station
Role of contact
Typical frequency of observations for this station (reports per day). If irregular use reporting_time.
Reporting hour(s) if non-standard / irregular hours used
Method used to report observations
Whether station is automated, manual or mixed
Station / AWS model type
ID or serial number of measuring system
array indicating which variables are observed by this station
Any other comments / footnotes
Flag indicating availability of additional data
